newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: KPN manager to head Endemol supervisory board.
newsitem.headline: KPN manager to head Endemol supervisory board.

text.p: Dutch television production group Endemol Entertainment Holding BV said it had appointed Ben Verwaayen as chairman of its supervisory board.
Verwaayen is chief executive officer of PTT Telecom, the telecommunications arm of Dutch Koninklijke PTT Nederland.

Endemol, which has previously announced it will seek a flotation of its shares on the Amsterdam Stock Exchange later this year, added that it plans to increase the number of members of its supervisory board to five from the current four at short notice.
